projects.name: Todo App (Microservice Infrastructure)
projects.description:
Technical stacks:
  • NATs broker
  • Docker + Docker compose
  • User service using Python
  • Todo service using NodeJs
  • MongoDb
  • API gateway using Framework FastifyJs
